params._RIBBON_EARN_USDC_VAULT: is the Ribbon Earn USDC vault address
params._SET_PRODUCT_TIMELOCK: is the minimum time between last product was set and swap
params._minProviderSwap: is the min amount for swap

params._amount: is the amount of the product

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._minProviderSwap: is the swap amount in USDC

params._issueAddress: is the sweeper address                      for sending USDC for product issuance
params._mmSpread: is the mm product / USDC spread fee
params._product: is the product address (ex: bIB01 address)
params._providerSpread: is the provider product / USDC spread fee
params._redeemAddress: is the sweeper address                      for sending product token for product redemption

params._amount: is the amount of the _fromAsset token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

convertToProductAmount(address,uint256).notice: Converts from USDC to product amount

convertToUSDCAmount(address,uint256).notice: Converts from product to USDC amount

pendingSettledAssetAmount(address).notice: Since issuance / redemption is T+0 but not atomic, there will be a pending settlement before USDC or product lands on MM contract

setMinProviderSwap(uint256).notice: Sets the min amount to be able to swap

settleTPlus0Transfer(address).notice: Transfers the product OR USDC to the Ribbon Earn        USDC Vault after T+0 lag for Issuance / Redemption

swap(address,address,uint256).notice: Swaps to a product or USDC
